title: There is a fix but it keeps coming back!
body: So, I have an issue where I will play games and have to close out of LoL to delete my game.cfg and persistedSettings files before I can use my keyboard commands. I understand that, but I am getting annoyed where I am getting this every 4-5 games and I haven't even logged out, I just went from one game to another. It is really getting annoying when it happens and I have to listen to my team say how they are reporting me for leaving and coming back and yadda.  Is it so much to ask for a perm fix? Every time I try to work with Support they say delete these files or its a network setting. I need to find out what is corrupting these files.

replies.body:
You're definitely fixing those damaged config files the right way, but you need to add a couple additional steps to ensure they don't just revert back to how they were. Follow these steps one by one, and you should be set!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

Didn't he say that he was doing that
I think that was the fix...

I am doing all of that, but like tonight, I was going from one URF to another and I had to log out to delete those files again. I hadn't even left the game idle and they got corrupt. There has to be something more I am missing. I would say its my AV but I have set it to not scan that folder, I have set it to not scan at all, I have even switched scanners 3-4 times. I have tried a fresh install of windows and LoL client.
